label: Lis, Jerzy A. & Barbara Lis.  2014. First record of Megacydnus secundus J. A. Lis, 2002, a representative of Afrotropical endemic burrower bug genus from Uganda, and an annotated checklist of Ugandan Cydnidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera). Zootaxa 3795(4): 494–496.
